description: An illustration of a screenshot of the arcade video game "Asteroids," which was - as hinted by the title of the puzzle ("Atari classic") - released by Atari in 1979. The screenshot is a long black rectangle, with rudimentary illustrations of a triangular spaceship and several multisided polygons representing asteroids of different sizes. A looping string of small white squares represents ammo shot by the spaceship at the asteroids with the intent of breaking them into smaller pieces.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
